pages.title: Cookie Assembler
pages.text: The cookie assembler creates magical cookies. For this it needs fuel (the same fuels as in a furnace work), a dough, a cookie cutter and 5 cocoa beans. The dough and the cocoa beans are consumed, the cookie cutter not. If you want less than 5 effects, you can fill cocoa bean slots with regular cocoa beans instead of magical cocoas.
The better your dough or the less effects, the stronger your cookie will be. To trigger the cookie, eat it.
